General.Name: TEGNA Inc
General.Description: TEGNA Inc. operates as a media company in the United States. The company operates television stations that deliver television programming and digital content. It offers news content to consumers across various platforms, including online, mobile, connected television, and social platforms; owns and operates multicast networks under the names True Crime Network, Quest, and Twist that offer on-demand episodes of shows; and operates VAULT Studios, which provides true crime and investigative content in the form of podcasts and original television programs. In addition, the company provides solutions for advertisers through TEGNA Marketing Solutions (TMS). TMS delivers results for advertisers across television and digital platforms, as well as over-the-top (OTT) platforms, including Premion OTT advertising network. It operates 64 television stations in 51 markets. TEGNA Inc. was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Tysons, Virginia.
General.Address: 8350 Broad Street, Tysons, VA, United States, 22102-5151

3.Name: Ms. Lynn Beall Trelstad
